inputs.name: FORCE 2020 Well Logs
inputs.sha256_note: Sample hash for 15_9-13.las; 118 total files with unique hashes
inputs.description: LAS format well log files from Norwegian Continental Shelf with lithofacies labels

inputs.name: AstraDB Vector Store
inputs.sha256_note: Cloud-hosted database; content hash varies by ingestion
inputs.description: Vector embeddings (768-dim) of graph nodes with metadata
inputs.source: Generated from FORCE 2020 data via WatsonX Granite embedding model

inputs.name: NetworkX Graph Index
inputs.description: Graph with 2,751 nodes (wells, curves) and 2,421 edges (well-to-curve relationships)
inputs.source: Derived from FORCE 2020 LAS file headers

inputs.name: EIA Drilling Productivity
inputs.sha256_note: Not used in Phase 1 MCP integration
inputs.description: US regional oil/gas production and rig count statistics

inputs.name: USGS Water Data
inputs.sha256_note: Not used in Phase 1 MCP integration
inputs.description: Streamflow measurements from USGS monitoring sites
inputs.source: U.S. Geological Survey National Water Information System
